name: Timothy Adventures
description:
Are you ready to steal all those shiny treasures? Put in the black robes of the legendary museum robber Timothy in his greatest (and only yet) adventure! 

During 20 levels and 5 worlds, you'll be able to plot all the legendary robberies of our fellow thief in over 20 levels divided in 5 different worlds, all of them with amazing 8-bits graphics to satisfy the little nostalgia you have inside.

In this game, you move by turns to avoid all the enemies and the traps they set to trap poor Timothy! See how as you progress the game the security guards grow more bitter towards you and how every challenge is harder than the last!

Made with PuzzleScript.
